snippet: More than 72,000 young immigrants who are in the United States illegally have applied for two-year deportation deferrals, and this week the first approvals have been granted.
abstract: More than 72,000 young immigrants who are in the United States illegally have applied for two-year deportation deferrals under the new program from the Obama administration, and the first approvals have been granted.
lead_paragraph: More than 72,000 young immigrants who are in the United States illegally have applied for two-year deportation deferrals, and this week the first approvals have been granted.

headline.seo: Program Offering Immigrants Reprieve Is Off to Quick Start
headline.main: Quick Start to Program Offering Immigrants a Reprieve
headline.print_headline: Quick Start to Program Offering Immigrants a Reprieve
